prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Chromatic Percussion, Synth Lead, Drums, Guitar, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Guitar, Chromatic Percussion, and a Synth Lead, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Chromatic Percussion, Synth Lead, Drums, and Guitar, omitting Bass.

Style 3:
No Bass is included in this song, but it does have Drums, Guitar, Chromatic Percussion, and a Synth Lead.
